# Highway Tractor and Truck Rental Services
## Request for Standing Offers

### Notice Information
* Title: Highway Tractor and Truck Rental Services (W0113-23CS11B)
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS4296536479
* Publication Date: January 19, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 5, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

### Contract Information
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: January 31, 2025, with option periods

### Contract Scope
The Department of National Defence is seeking a Standing Offer provider for the rental of highway tractors and trucks on an “as requested” basis. The rental duration may be daily, weekly or monthly and all vehicles will be driven and operated by Federal Government personnel only. Vehicles can be driven across Canada and the United States of America.

The required vehicles are:

* Tractor with day cab
* Tractor with sleeper cab
* 5-ton cargo truck
* 5-ton reefer truck

### Important Notes
* This request for standing offers (RFSO) cancels and supersedes previous RFSO number Doc4345289627.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 5, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.
* Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to trade agreement partners, including Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership.

### Contact Information
Contact Sabrina Cheng, SPAC/PSPC, for any questions or inquiries.

### Notice URL
The notice can be found at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18568580. 

### End User Entities
The end user entities for this contract are the Department of National Defence, Canadian Forces Base Borden and Canadian Forces Base Petawawa.
